Natural organic food interfaces with the bodies systems. Once we process or add growth hormones, pesticides, overcook it, or add ingredients that have been radiated, we alter the natural frequency of the food and thereby alter our cells at its sub-atomic structural level. Continual use of this type of nutrition throughout the years creates health hazards and chronic illnesses.
